com.philips.pins.shinelib

Interface SHNDeviceAssociation.SHNDeviceAssociationListener

  • Enclosing class:
    SHNDeviceAssociation

    public static interface SHNDeviceAssociation.SHNDeviceAssociationListener
    Interface to receive updates for the current association.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAssociatedDevicesUpdated()
      Indicates that the association has been updated.
      void onAssociationFailed(SHNResult shnError)
      Indicates that the association has failed for the peripheral.
      void onAssociationStarted(SHNAssociationProcedure shnDeviceAssociationProcedure)
      Indicates that the association was started with the SHNAssociationProcedure.
      void onAssociationStopped()
      Indicates that the association has been stopped.
      void onAssociationSucceeded(SHNDevice shnDevice)
      Indicates that the association has finished successfully.

    • Method Detail

      • onAssociationStarted

        void onAssociationStarted(SHNAssociationProcedure shnDeviceAssociationProcedure)
        Indicates that the association was started with the SHNAssociationProcedure.
        Parameters:
        shnDeviceAssociationProcedure - used to associate with the peripheral

      • onAssociationStopped

        void onAssociationStopped()
        Indicates that the association has been stopped.

      • onAssociationSucceeded

        void onAssociationSucceeded(SHNDevice shnDevice)
        Indicates that the association has finished successfully. The associated device is stored automatically. It can be obtained via SHNDeviceAssociation.getAssociatedDevices().
        Parameters:
        shnDevice - created for the associated peripheral

      • onAssociationFailed

        void onAssociationFailed(SHNResult shnError)
        Indicates that the association has failed for the peripheral.
        Parameters:
        shnError - that occurred during the association

      • onAssociatedDevicesUpdated

        void onAssociatedDevicesUpdated()
        Indicates that the association has been updated. Will be called if the peripheral information was injected successfully via SHNDeviceAssociation.injectAssociatedDevice(String, String, SHNResultListener).
